verses.verse: And it shall come to pass, when all these things <WH1697> are come <WH935> <WH8799> upon thee, the b'rakhah <WH1293> and the curse <WH7045>, which I have set <WH5414> <WH8804> before <WH6440> thee, and thou shalt call <WH7725> <WH8689> them to mind <WH3824> among all the nations <WH1471>, whither the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> hath driven <WH5080> <WH8689> thee,

And shalt return <WH7725> <WH8804> unto the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, and shalt obey <WH8085> <WH8804> his voice <WH6963> according to all that I command <WH6680> <WH8764> thee this day <WH3117>, thou and thy children <WH1121>, with all thine heart <WH3824>, and with all thy soul <WH5315>;

That then the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> will turn <WH7725> <WH8804> thy captivity <WH7622>, and have compassion <WH7355> <WH8765> upon thee, and will return <WH7725> <WH8804> and gather <WH6908> <WH8765> thee from all the nations <WH5971>, whither the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> hath scattered <WH6327> <WH8689> thee.

If any of thine be driven out <WH5080> <WH8737> unto the outmost <WH7097> parts of heaven <WH8064>, from thence will the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> gather <WH6908> <WH8762> thee, and from thence will he fetch <WH3947> <WH8799> thee:

And the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> will bring <WH935> <WH8689> thee into the land <WH776> which thy fathers <WH1> possessed <WH3423> <WH8804>, and thou shalt possess <WH3423> <WH8804> it; and he will do thee good <WH3190> <WH8689>, and multiply <WH7235> <WH8689> thee above thy fathers <WH1>.

And the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> will circumcise <WH4135> <WH8804> thine heart <WH3824>, and the heart <WH3824> of thy seed <WH2233>, to love <WH157> <WH8800> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> with all thine heart <WH3824>, and with all thy soul <WH5315>, that thou mayest live <WH2416>.

And the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> will put <WH5414> <WH8804> all these curses <WH423> upon thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802>, and on them that hate <WH8130> <WH8802> thee, which persecuted <WH7291> <WH8804> thee.

And thou shalt return <WH7725> <WH8799> and obey <WH8085> <WH8804> the voice <WH6963> of the YY <WH3068>, and do <WH6213> <WH8804> all his Mitzvot <WH4687> which I command <WH6680> <WH8764> thee this day <WH3117>.

And the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> will make thee plenteous <WH3498> <WH8689> in every work <WH4639> of thine hand <WH3027>, in the fruit <WH6529> of thy body <WH990>, and in the fruit <WH6529> of thy cattle <WH929>, and in the fruit <WH6529> of thy land <WH127>, for good <WH2896>: for the YY <WH3068> will again <WH7725> <WH8799> rejoice <WH7797> <WH8800> over thee for good <WH2896>, as he rejoiced <WH7797> <WH8804> over thy fathers <WH1>:

If thou shalt hearken <WH8085> <WH8799> unto the voice <WH6963> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, to keep <WH8104> <WH8800> his Mitzvot <WH4687> and his statutes <WH2708> which are written <WH3789> <WH8803> in this book <WH5612> of the Torah <WH8451>, and if thou turn <WH7725> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> with all thine heart <WH3824>, and with all thy soul <WH5315>.
For this Mitzvah <WH4687> which I command <WH6680> <WH8764> thee this day <WH3117>, it is not hidden <WH6381> <WH8737> from thee, neither is it far off <WH7350>.

It is not in heaven <WH8064>, that thou shouldest say <WH559> <WH8800>, Who shall go up <WH5927> <WH8799> for us to heaven <WH8064>, and bring <WH3947> <WH8799> it unto us, that we may hear <WH8085> <WH8686> it, and do <WH6213> <WH8799> it?

Neither is it beyond <WH5676> the sea <WH3220>, that thou shouldest say <WH559> <WH8800>, Who shall go <WH5674> <WH8799> over <WH5676> the sea <WH3220> for us, and bring <WH3947> <WH8799> it unto us, that we may hear <WH8085> <WH8686> it, and do <WH6213> <WH8799> it?
But the word <WH1697> is very <WH3966> nigh <WH7138> unto thee, in thy mouth <WH6310>, and in thy heart <WH3824>, that thou mayest do <WH6213> <WH8800> it.
See <WH7200> <WH8798>, I have set <WH5414> <WH8804> before <WH6440> thee this day <WH3117> life <WH2416> and good <WH2896>, and death <WH4194> and evil <WH7451>;

In that I command <WH6680> <WH8764> thee this day <WH3117> to love <WH157> <WH8800> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, to walk <WH3212> <WH8800> in his ways <WH1870>, and to keep <WH8104> <WH8800> his Mitzvot <WH4687> and his statutes <WH2708> and his judgments <WH4941>, that thou mayest live <WH2421> <WH8804> and multiply <WH7235> <WH8804>: and the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> shall bless <WH1288> <WH8765> thee in the land <WH776> whither thou goest <WH935> <WH8802> to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> it.

But if thine heart <WH3824> turn away <WH6437> <WH8799>, so that thou wilt not hear <WH8085> <WH8799>, but shalt be drawn away <WH5080> <WH8738>, and worship <WH7812> <WH8694> other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430>, and serve <WH5647> <WH8804> them;

I denounce <WH5046> <WH8689> unto you this day <WH3117>, that ye shall surely <WH6> <WH8800> perish <WH6> <WH8799>, and that ye shall not prolong <WH748> <WH8686> your days <WH3117> upon the land <WH127>, whither thou passest over <WH5674> <WH8802> Yarden <WH3383> to go <WH935> <WH8800> to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> it.

I call <WH5749> heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776> to record <WH5749> <WH8689> this day <WH3117> against you, that I have set <WH5414> <WH8804> before <WH6440> you life <WH2416> and death <WH4194>, b'rakhah <WH1293> and cursing <WH7045>: therefore choose <WH977> <WH8804> life <WH2416>, that both thou and thy seed <WH2233> may live <WH2421> <WH8799>:

That thou mayest love <WH157> <WH8800> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, and that thou mayest obey <WH8085> <WH8800> his voice <WH6963>, and that thou mayest cleave <WH1692> <WH8800> unto him: for he is thy life <WH2416>, and the length <WH753> of thy days <WH3117>: that thou mayest dwell <WH3427> <WH8800> in the land <WH127> which the YY <WH3068> sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto thy fathers <WH1>, to Avraham <WH85>, to Yitz'chak <WH3327>, and to Ya`akov <WH3290>, to give <WH5414> <WH8800> them.
